page.title: 18Changing Times.
page.content: Things are changing in our area. Several of the larger old country houses have been bought by English Local Authorities, and are being used as Outdoor Persuit Centres. Ty Carreg, near the school, has been bought by a group of Birmingham business men called "The Stonehouse Gang" who bought the property for deprived Birmingham children. Many small farmhouses have been bought as private holiday homes and remain empty all Winter. The Post Office in Ffynnon Gynydd closed 3 years ago.Only the School remains as a focal communal point;even this has been threatened with closure. We feel it is vital for the welfare of the community, that our School remains open for many years to come.
